body_html: I think it is not a easy task, since there is no central storage for all available modules. You could store them in a list, and manually traverse them when needed. It will not add much boilerplate.
body_text: I think it is not a easy task, since there is no central storage for all available modules. You could store them in a list, and manually traverse them when needed. It will not add much boilerplate.
body: I think it is not a easy task, since there is no central storage for all available modules. You could store them in a list, and manually traverse them when needed. It will not add much boilerplate.
